Five Amazing Colleges

College of Arts & Sciences

Home to occupational therapy, physical therapy, dental hygiene, kinesiology, health care administration, and one of the nation’s top-ranked nutrition and food science programs.

College of Arts & Sciences

Home to occupational therapy, physical therapy, dental hygiene, kinesiology, health care administration, and one of the nation’s top-ranked nutrition and food science programs.

— Lisa, Kinesiology Major

Faculty Who Help You Succeed

Annie Abraham
Assistant Clinical Professor, BSN

Professor Abraham teaches in the family nurse practitioner program, and the advanced practice nursing seminar. Her research interests include health promotion and disease prevention, diabetes, and pain.

Management final gives ‘A’ for real-world experience
Denton

More than 12,000 students study at TWU’s Denton campus, which offers programs in the liberal arts, the sciences, business, and education.

Dallas

The TWU T. Boone Pickens Institute of Health Sciences in Dallas offers programs in nursing, occupational therapy, physical therapy, health systems management, and an EMBA.

Houston

The TWU Institute of Health Sciences in Houston offers programs in health care administration, nursing, nutrition and food sciences, occupational therapy, physical therapy, and an EMBA.
